# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format1Monochrome

**Case**

A 1-bit indexed pixel format.

## Declaration

```swift
case format1Monochrome
```

## Discussion

This pixel format supports color spaces that are either [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGColorSpaceModel/monochrome] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGColorSpaceModel/indexed].

## Indexed color format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format1IndexedGray_WhiteIsZero**: A 1-bit indexed pixel format with white equal to zero.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format2Indexed**: A 2-bit indexed pixel format.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format2IndexedGray_WhiteIsZero**: A 2-bit indexed pixel format with white equal to zero.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format4Indexed**: A 4-bit indexed pixel format.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format4IndexedGray_WhiteIsZero**: A 4-bit indexed pixel format with white equal to zero.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format8Indexed**: An 8-bit indexed pixel format.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format8IndexedGray_WhiteIsZero**: An 8-bit indexed pixel format with white equal to zero.
